item.title: 中国批准在印度边境修建世界上最大的水坝
item.description: 中国正加紧计划在其与印度有争议的边界附近建造一座巨型水坝，这项巨大工程的发电量可能是三峡大坝的三倍。【原文：China is pressing ahead with plans to construct a mega-dam near its contested border with India, a colossal undertaking that could generate three times as much power as the Three Gorges Dam.】

item.title: 经过一年艰苦的气候谈判，"多边主义 "是一种选择
item.description:
从保护生物多样性到应对塑料污染，今年召开的一次又一次会议都以失望告终。【原文：

From protecting biodiversity to tackling plastic pollution, meeting after meeting this year ended in disappointment. 

】

item.title: 为什么我的素食朋友们又开始吃肉了？
item.description:
这种转变引起了我的兴趣。这是否代表了一种日益增长的趋势，如果是，这对引导人们更多地采用植物性饮食意味着什么？【原文：

The shift piqued my interest. Does this represent a growing trend, and if so, what does that mean for efforts to nudge people toward more plant-based diets?

】

item.title: 巴拿马总统认为第一量子矿山不会带来直接风险
item.description: 巴拿马总统何塞-劳尔-穆利诺（Jose Raul Mulino）表示，一份政府报告显示，第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd.）于 2023 年关闭的铜矿 Cobre Panama 不存在直接的环境或安全风险。【原文：Panama’s President Jose Raul Mulino said a government report shows there are no immediate environmental or safety risks from Cobre Panama, the First Quantum Minerals Ltd. copper mine that was shut in 2023.】

item.title: 如何在节日期间减少浪费食物
item.description:
从剩饭剩菜在冰箱中能保存多久，到霉菌是否意味着您需要扔掉某些东西，这些都是您关于食物浪费的关键问题。【原文：

From how long leftovers keep in the fridge to if mold means you need to toss something, these are your key food waste questions, answered.

】

item.title: 阿联酋公司将开始跟踪和报告碳排放量
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国将要求各公司监测并报告其排放量，以努力实现到 2050 年实现碳中和的目标。【原文：The United Arab Emirates will require companies to monitor and report their emissions in an effort to reach a target to become carbon neutral by 2050.】

item.title: 詹妮弗-格兰霍尔姆谈拜登能源遗产的存续问题
item.description:
能源转型的政治持久性。【原文：

The political durability of the energy transition.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：詹妮弗-格兰霍尔姆谈拜登的能源遗产（播客）
item.description: 拜登政府将能源和气候问题作为政府工作的核心，其中最引人注目的是《通货膨胀削减法案》。与此同时，在过去四年中，我们看到美国石油和天然气生产蓬勃发展，同时，战略石油储备作为稳定价格和供应的工具也得到了新的利用。与此同时，从与中国的战略和经济竞争的角度来看，对电池和其他清洁技术的投资被认为是至关重要的。那么，什么是【原文：The Biden administration made energy and climate a centerpiece of its administration, most notably through the Inflation Reduction Act. At the same time, we’ve seen a boom in US oil and gas production the last four years, alongside the novel use of the Strategic Petroleum Reserve as a price and supply stabilization tool. Meanwhile, investments in batteries and other clean technologies have been framed as crucial from the perspective of strategic and economic competition with China. So what was a】

item.title: 印度煤电厂增长接近五年新高
item.description: 印度依靠煤炭来满足约四分之三的电力需求，其新增装机容量接近五年来的最高水平，以满足激增的用电量。【原文：India — which relies on coal to meet about three-quarters of electricity demand — kept installations of new capacity near a five-year high to try to meet surging power usage.】

item.title: 台风和卡拉 OK 如何摧毁日本保险业
item.description:
日本保险业巨头在代价高昂的灾难后被发现串通一气，正在抛售超过560 亿美元的股票 

Japan’s insurance giants are selling over $56 billion in shares after getting caught colluding in the wake of costly disasters 

】

item.title: 欧拉电器在消费者投诉年中开设 3,200 家门店
item.description: 印度最大的电动摩托车制造商 Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 宣布在一天之内开设 3,200 家新门店，以扩大其在当地的业务范围，并解决客户对服务缺陷的不满。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. announced opening of 3,200 new stores in a single day, as India’s biggest e-scooter maker seeks to expand its local footprint and address customer frustration related to shortcomings in service.】

item.title: 纽约市平安夜出现白雪，但雪不会一直下
item.description: 纽约市民在平安夜享受了一场白色的圣诞夜，全市降下了小雪，但预报员说，大部分雪将在周三早上融化。【原文：New Yorkers were treated to a white Christmas Eve as light snow fell across the city, but most of it will melt away by Wednesday morning, forecasters said.】

item.title: 2024 年底的一些气候好消息
item.description: 今天的时事通讯回顾了今年您可能错过的一些气候方面的好消息。我们还分享了一些好书建议，供您在假期阅读。【原文：Today’s newsletter reflects on some of the good climate news you may have missed this year. We also share some great book suggestions to add to your holiday reading list.】

item.title: 野火之战正在向高科技发展
item.description:
初创公司正在利用化学、卫星和人工智能等一切手段来探测和预防因全球变暖而加剧的火灾。【原文：

Startups are using everything from chemistry to satellites and artificial intelligence to detect and prevent fires turbocharged by global warming.

】

item.title: 太阳能、电动汽车和煤炭的大幅退出：2024 年的气候好消息
item.description:
创纪录的太阳能安装量、挪威的电动汽车革命以及七国集团（G7）成员逐步淘汰煤炭，这些只是今年地球上的部分好消息。【原文：

Record solar installations, Norway’s electric vehicle revolution and a G7 member’s coal phase-out are just some of the good news stories for the planet this year.

】

item.title: 假日阅读清单上的十本气候书籍
item.description:
谋杀推理小说和爱情小说都过时了。《Bloomberg Green》 记者和编辑为气候书呆子和气候好奇者挑选了他们最喜欢的书籍。【原文：

Move over murder mysteries and romance novels. Bloomberg Green reporters and editors have picked their top books for climate nerds and the climate-curious alike.

】

item.title: 假期需求低迷，德国本周将迎来风电淡季
item.description: 据预测，本周德国的风力发电量将急剧下降，但由于假期期间的需求低于往常，价格影响可能会受到抑制。【原文：Germany’s wind generation is forecast to plunge this week but the price effect will likely be damped by lower-than-usual demand during the holiday period.】

item.title: 日本力争到 2035 年减排 60% 目标被视为宽松
item.description: 日本正在推进一项新目标，即到 2035 年将温室气体排放量减少 60%，尽管该计划面临着缺乏雄心壮志的批评。【原文：Japan is pushing through a new target to cut greenhouse gas emissions by 60% by 2035, even as the plan faces criticism as lacking in ambition.】

item.title: 印度应对有毒农场火灾的清洁燃料计划步履蹒跚
item.description: 多年来，农民法特比尔-辛格-西德胡（Fatehbir Singh Sidhu）收割完稻谷后就放火烧田。这种做法绝非绝无仅有，在印度旁遮普邦，他周围成千上万的种植者仍在这样做，以便为下一个播种周期迅速清理土地。【原文：For years, farmer Fatehbir Singh Sidhu harvested his rice and then set the fields on fire. The practice was far from unique — thousands of growers around him in the Indian state of Punjab still do the same to swiftly clear land for the next sowing cycle.】

item.title: 2024 年全球疾病复发显示健康威胁日益严重
item.description: 一些传染病在 2024 年大幅飙升，其传播的部分原因是气候变化、疫苗接种率下降以及新病原体变种的出现。【原文：Some infectious diseases saw a huge surge in 2024, with the spread attributed in part to climate change, declining vaccination rates and the advent of new pathogen variants.】

item.title: 巨灾债券的发行将整个市场推向近 500 亿美元的规模
item.description: 随着保险公司将代价高昂的气候灾害带来的更多风险转嫁给私人投资者，巨灾债券的发行量在今年创下新高，使整个市场的规模增至近 500 亿美元。【原文：Catastrophe-bond issuance rose to a record this year, increasing the overall market to almost $50 billion, as insurers transferred more risk from costly climate disasters to private investors.】

item.title: 二叠纪盆地甲烷排放量因钻井商堵住泄漏而下降
item.description: 根据 S&P Global Commodity Insights 的一项研究，去年美国最大石油盆地的甲烷排放量骤降 26%，原因是各公司加强了运营，并采用了新技术来阻止这种强效温室气体的泄漏。【原文：Methane emissions in the largest US oil basin plunged 26% last year as companies tightened operations and deployed new technology to stop leaks of the potent greenhouse gas, according to a study by S&P Global Commodity Insights.】

item.title: 绿色氢能的炒作正在让位于现实
item.description: 今年，氢能被炒得沸沸扬扬。今天的时事通讯将探讨现实情况，包括 BloombergNEF 最新报告的预测。您可以在 Bloomberg.com 上阅读和分享这些探讨氢能前景的报道。如需无限制地获取气候和能源新闻，请订阅。【原文：Hydrogen has gotten a heavy dose of hype this year. Today’s newsletter looks at the reality, including a forecast from a new BloombergNEF report. You can read and share these stories exploring the hydrogen landscape on Bloomberg.com. For unlimited access to climate and energy news, please subscribe.】

item.title: 绿色氢气价格将在几十年内居高不下
item.description:
据研究公司 BloombergNEF 称，在大多数地区，氢气的价格将无法与传统制造的氢气持平。【原文：

The gas will fail to reach price parity with conventionally made hydrogen in most regions, according to research firm BloombergNEF. 

】

item.title: 电子垃圾正在填满垃圾填埋场。如何减少电子垃圾？
item.description:
一年中产生的电子垃圾数量足以装满环绕赤道的卡车。【原文：

The amount of electronic waste generated in a year could fill enough trucks to encircle the equator. 

】

item.title: 卢旺达在推动绿色能源发展中瞄准无处不在的汽油自行车
item.description: 卢旺达力图通过一项于 1 月 1 日生效的新政策，用更环保的替代品取代首都通常用作出租车的汽油自行车。【原文：Rwanda seeks to replace gasoline-fueled bikes that are typically used as taxis in its capital with greener alternatives through a new policy that takes effect on Jan. 1.】

item.title: 30 年期房贷并非为应对气候混乱而设计
item.description:
随着摧毁房屋的天气越来越常见，越来越多的美国人将发现自己失去了安全网。【原文：

As house-demolishing weather becomes increasingly common, more Americans will find themselves without a safety net.

】

item.title: 梦想白色圣诞？这些社区等待已久
item.description:
对许多人来说，下雪的圣诞节是田园诗般的生活。以下是一些等待节日大雪已久的城市。【原文：

A snowy Christmas is idyllic for many. Here are cities that have waited a long time for holiday snow.

】

item.title: 阿尔卑斯山大雪引发雪崩风险，西班牙遭遇强风袭击
item.description: 圣诞节前，阿尔卑斯山部分地区大雪纷飞，而欧洲其他地区的大风天气也引发了天气警报。【原文：Snow blanketed parts of the Alps in the lead-up to Christmas, while windy conditions triggered weather alerts elsewhere in Europe.】

item.title: 禁止外国化石燃料融资计划在经合组织失败
item.description: 在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普就职前几周，富裕国家就一项计划进行的会谈破裂，该计划将为石油和天然气项目提供数百亿美元的公共支持。【原文：Talks on a plan by wealthy nations to throttle tens of billions of dollars in public support for oil and gas projects have broken down without agreement, weeks before President-elect Donald Trump takes office.】
